              [
                "Sphinx",
                [
                  [
                    "a",
                    "http://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/stable/"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " is a tool to generate HTML based documentation for Python projects based on docstrings. Its markup language used is "
              ],
              [
                "reStructuredText",
                [
                  [
                    "a",
                    "http://docutils.sourceforge.net/rst.html"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                ". They define their own standards for documentation, pythonhosted.org hosts a "
              ],
              [
                "very good description of them",
                [
                  [
                    "a",
                    "https://pythonhosted.org/an_example_pypi_project/sphinx.html"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                ". The Sphinx format is for example used by the "
              ],
              [
                "pyCharm IDE",
                [
                  [
                    "a",
                    "https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                "."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }

                "def hello(name, language=\"en\"):\n    \"\"\"Say hello to a person.\n\n    Args:\n        name: the name of the person as string\n        language: the language code string\n\n    Returns:\n        A number.\n    \"\"\"\n\n    print(greeting[language]+\" \"+name)\n    return 4"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
